name: MechaKill
description:
My first ever uploaded game, and my first game jam. (Made in 9 days)

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Movement
  • LMB - Shoot / Pick Up
  • RMB - Aim
  • SCROLL - Select Weapon
  • F - Grappling Hook
  • E - Interact

I didn't finish in time but I will be updating the game and actually polishing everything. Feel free to point out any bugs!

Currently there is not much gameplay, and I hope people realize that I missed the RMB to aim in the yellow text... :p

Also, refresh the page if you want to go back to the menu.
